videos.title: High-Velocity Bitcoin
videos.text: We discuss bitcoin as store of value (SoV) vs. medium of exchange (MoE).

videos.title: Code by Voice
videos.text: What if you had a coding agent in your pocket? Now you do. (Live in v0.0.4) We demo Onyx fixing a bug in its own codebase -- without us typing a single word or line of code.

videos.title: Neutrality Wins
videos.text: It's the 12th and final Night of OpenAgents! We celebrate by reviewing our progress with Onyx, talking smack about OpenAI, and reviewing our project's five major principles: Open Agents, One Market, Incentivized Interop, Bitcoin Only, and a new one: Neutrality Wins.

videos.title: Onyx Beta Launch
videos.text: We launch Onyx v0.0.1, our first beta build for Android and iOS! This build includes a local version of Llama 3.2 1B that runs privately on your phone.
